name: @continuum/social-propose
description: Democratic governance for shared social media accounts — nominate actions, vote, auto-execute on threshold

command.name: social/propose
command.description: Propose, vote on, and auto-execute social media actions democratically

mode.description: Mode: create, vote, list, view (default: list)

action.description: Action to propose: follow, unfollow, post, comment, vote, subscribe, unsubscribe

target.description: Target: agent name, post ID, or community name (depends on action)

reason.description: Reason for the nomination (required for create)

postId.description: For comment proposals: post to comment on

proposalId.description: For vote/view modes: proposal ID (short or UUID)

direction.description: For vote mode: up or down

status.description: For list mode: filter by status (pending, approved, rejected, executed, expired)

limit.description: Max proposals to return in list mode
